title: Close Air Support (CAS) Asset Management
description: A Joint Terminal Attack Controller (JTAC) must select and control a Close Air Support aircraft to engage enemy forces in close proximity to friendly troops.

tasks.description: Identify the locations of friendly forces and the enemy target.
tasks.expected_outcome: JTAC has a precise understanding of the tactical situation.

tasks.description: Select the most appropriate available CAS aircraft (e.g., A-10 for loitering, F-16 for fast strike) for the mission.
tasks.expected_outcome: JTAC selects the best aircraft for the specific target and situation.

tasks.description: Provide the aircraft with a 9-line CAS brief to guide it onto the target and give final clearance to attack.
tasks.expected_outcome: JTAC communicates the information clearly and accurately, resulting in a successful strike with no friendly fire.
